exercises.title: Hello world
exercises.description: Write a function that will return a string preceded by 'Hello'. This function will take a word or phrase as a string. You should protect against null values.

exercises.title: Add to array
exercises.description: Write a function that will take an array of strings and another string and add the string onto the array. If the array is null, return null. If the string is null or empty, return the original array. Otherwise return the modified array.
